Package controller

Class ToySearch

java.lang.Object
controller.ToySearch
public class ToySearch extends Object
Controller of the program that connects to the GUI and manages list changes
Author:
Mitchel Chanthaseng

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addToy(Toy toy)
    creating a method to add toy in the ToySearch class and make the JUNIT test
    void
    addToyButtonHandler()
    Add toy button handler that adds a toy depending on which toy type is selected and automatically saves it into the data base when added.
    void
    buyButtonHandler()
    Buy button handler that updates the selected toy's available count by -1 and automatically saves it into the data base when purchased.
    void
    clearButtonHandler()
    Clear button handler that clears the current display.
    ArrayList<Toy>
    findByName(String name)
    creating Arraylist toy to hold all the toys found by name
    ArrayList<Toy>
    findBySerialNumber(String serialNumber)
    creating arraylist toy to hold all the toys found by Serial number
    ArrayList<Toy>
    findByType(String type)
    creating arraylist toy to hold all the toys found by type
    void
    initialize()
    Initializer that loads the file with all the toy information and stores it into a toy list.
    void
    refreshButtonHandler()
    Refresh button handler that clears the current display and then display the entire toy list.
    void
    removeButtonHandler()
    Remove button handler that will remove the selected toy from the toy list and display.
    void
    removeTabRefreshButtonHandler()
    Refresh button in remove tab handler that will clear the current display and display the entire toy list.
    void
    searchButtonHandler()
    Search button handler that searches the toys list and displays toys depending on which search is selected.
    void
    searchToRemoveButtonHandler()
    Search button in remove toy tab handler that searhes the toy list for a matching serial number and displays the toy to the user if found.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws SecurityException, IOException
      Initializer that loads the file with all the toy information and stores it into a toy list. Once the file is read, initialize() displays all the toys in scene builder on start up.
      Throws:
      IOException
      SecurityException

    • findBySerialNumber

      public ArrayList<Toy> findBySerialNumber(String serialNumber)
      creating arraylist toy to hold all the toys found by Serial number
      Parameters:
      type -
      Returns:
      the list of the type of toys chosen

    • findByName

      public ArrayList<Toy> findByName(String name)
      creating Arraylist toy to hold all the toys found by name
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      public ArrayList<Toy> findByType(String type)
      creating arraylist toy to hold all the toys found by type
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the list of the type of toys chosen

    • addToy

      public void addToy(Toy toy)
      creating a method to add toy in the ToySearch class and make the JUNIT test
      Parameters:
      toy -

    • searchButtonHandler

      public void searchButtonHandler() throws Exception
      Search button handler that searches the toys list and displays toys depending on which search is selected.
      Throws:
      Exception - No radio button selected

    • clearButtonHandler

      public void clearButtonHandler()
      Clear button handler that clears the current display.

    • refreshButtonHandler

      public void refreshButtonHandler()
      Refresh button handler that clears the current display and then display the entire toy list.

    • buyButtonHandler

      public void buyButtonHandler()
      Buy button handler that updates the selected toy's available count by -1 and automatically saves it into the data base when purchased.

    • addToyButtonHandler

      public void addToyButtonHandler()
      Add toy button handler that adds a toy depending on which toy type is selected and automatically saves it into the data base when added.

    • searchToRemoveButtonHandler

      public void searchToRemoveButtonHandler()
      Search button in remove toy tab handler that searhes the toy list for a matching serial number and displays the toy to the user if found.

    • removeButtonHandler

      public void removeButtonHandler()
      Remove button handler that will remove the selected toy from the toy list and display.

    • removeTabRefreshButtonHandler

      public void removeTabRefreshButtonHandler()
      Refresh button in remove tab handler that will clear the current display and display the entire toy list.
